n: Quick Vegan Warm Sweet Cinnamon Milk
des: "Delicious vegan drink, inspired by the taste of horchata. Adjust with more sweetener, if desired."
ins: Put stevia in a microwave-safe mug; pour in almond milk. Cook in a microwave oven until hot, about 1 minute and 20 seconds. Sprinkle cinnamon on top, add vanilla extract, and stir to combine.
